alert.note: Alert for Central Horry; Coastal Georgetown; Coastal Horry; Inland Georgetown; Marion (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 10 at 9:40AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Georgetown, southwestern Horry and southeastern Marion Counties through 1030 AM EDT... At 940 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout near Litchfield Beach, or near Pawleys Island, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Myrtle Beach, Conway, Surfside Beach, Pawleys Island, Socastee, Garden City, Murrells Inlet, Red Hill, Burgess, Bucksville, Bucksport, Dongola, Plantersville, Yauhannah, Coastal Carolina University, Litchfield Beach and Waccamaw Community Hospital. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Horry; Coastal Georgetown; Coastal Horry; Inland Georgetown; Marion
